channel.title: Online rsps help
channel.description: ive downloaded a rsps source and client but cant get it online, ive tryed everything: hosted on no-ip forwarded ports changed ip in files tryed hamachi tryed utorrent tryed a different client tyred to redownload source and client but everytime i download client it give me an error in winrar and doesnt give me all of the files ive had the source working on localhost and now have it working on my ip address but when someone else trys to log on another computer (same ip)(yes i have changed amount of allowed ip's) it just says "pk planet is offline, try again later" or "error connecting to server please reload client and try again" does anyone know how to fix this?

item.title: Online rsps help

item.description:

item.title: Online rsps help
item.dc:creator: @soda_chip soda chip
item.description:
@soda_chip wrote:

ive downloaded a rsps source and client but cant get it online, ive tryed everything:
hosted on no-ip
forwarded ports
changed ip in files
tryed hamachi
tryed utorrent
tryed a different client
tyred to redownload source and client but everytime i download client it give me an error in winrar and doesnt give me all of the files
ive had the source working on localhost and now have it working on my ip address but when someone else trys to log on another computer (same ip)(yes i have changed amount of allowed ip’s) it just says “pk planet is offline, try again later” or “error connecting to server please reload client and try again”
does anyone know how to fix this?

Read full topic
